title: Warden Sivir and Nautilus.
body: For some reason, the Splash art for the Warden skins remind me of Ornstein and Smough from Dark Souls. I have no idea why, but that is the first thing that comes to mind. Please tell me if i'm crazy.

replies.body: I got that read off the splash too. Combination of similar armor style, big/small pairing and lighting were what leaped out to me as the reasons. Loved Dark Souls too, so always happy to see stuff playing around with the same sort of thematic vibe.

Indeed. Also, you gave me somewhat of a heart attack, I didn't expect a Rioter to comment on this, let alone other people. Also, if Riot keeps making skins that remind me of Dark Souls, I may have no money remaining. I don't play Sivir or Nautilus, but I now want to.
I don't know about you guys but has anyone else seen the visual bug where when you use Q or hook the end of the hook is missing?
RIOT when will the warden skins come out?
